topic.title: Bozon.cc: A note app You can trust.
topic.body:
You are sly one?
Wanna encrypt all your secrets and get more privacy?
Get the new browser app for storing and organizing notes that are encrypted on a client-side.
https://bozon.cc

1548341709_1Dd51WrJk3z13F4R4cbXqb3NWz2kD.body:
> [leftside](#comment_493_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJVoVcDm): They're gonna peeping and stealing your ideas.

How?
All data is encrypted on client-side. 
Service stores only encypted data.
I can prove it for You.

Maybe in the future.
Thank You, johntox

> [styromaniac](#comment_465_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Getting this on ZeroNet would be wonderful.

Try it outside the ZeroNet :-)
